SUSHIGUY

Hello, I'm Sushiguy, a web developer from Sweden. With over 1 year of experience, I specialize in designing and developing static websites with modern technologies like React Native, Three JS, Node JS, MySQL, React JS & PostgreSQL. I also create 'CommandLineTools', games and animations. I also have experience in C, C++, Java, Bash and Python

Additionally i also create content about programming, web development and animations in my Youtube channel. Reach out if you have any questions or collaboration ideas!
